name: not_neZero
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝ : Zero R
n : R
⊢ Iff (Not (NeZero n)) (Eq n 0)
decl: theorem not_neZero {n : R} : ¬NeZero n ↔ n = 0 := by simp [neZero_iff]

name: eq_zero_or_neZero
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝ : Zero R
a : R
⊢ Or (Eq a 0) (NeZero a)
decl:
theorem eq_zero_or_neZero (a : R) : a = 0 ∨ NeZero a :=
  (eq_or_ne a 0).imp_right NeZero.mk

name: zero_ne_one
initialProofState:
α : Type u_2
inst✝² : Zero α
inst✝¹ : One α
inst✝ : NeZero 1
⊢ Ne 0 1
decl: @[simp] lemma zero_ne_one [One α] [NeZero (1 : α)] : (0 : α) ≠ 1 := NeZero.ne' (1 : α)

name: one_ne_zero
initialProofState:
α : Type u_2
inst✝² : Zero α
inst✝¹ : One α
inst✝ : NeZero 1
⊢ Ne 1 0
decl: @[simp] lemma one_ne_zero [One α] [NeZero (1 : α)] : (1 : α) ≠ 0 := NeZero.ne (1 : α)

name: ne_zero_of_eq_one
initialProofState:
α : Type u_2
inst✝² : Zero α
inst✝¹ : One α
inst✝ : NeZero 1
a : α
h : Eq a 1
⊢ Ne a 0
decl: lemma ne_zero_of_eq_one [One α] [NeZero (1 : α)] {a : α} (h : a = 1) : a ≠ 0 := h ▸ one_ne_zero

name: two_ne_zero
initialProofState:
α : Type u_2
inst✝² : Zero α
inst✝¹ : OfNat α 2
inst✝ : NeZero 2
⊢ Ne 2 0
decl:
@[field_simps]
lemma two_ne_zero [OfNat α 2] [NeZero (2 : α)] : (2 : α) ≠ 0 := NeZero.ne (2 : α)

initialProofState:
α : Type u_2
inst✝² : Zero α
inst✝¹ : OfNat α 3
inst✝ : NeZero 3
⊢ Ne 3 0
decl:
@[field_simps]
lemma three_ne_zero [OfNat α 3] [NeZero (3 : α)] : (3 : α) ≠ 0 := NeZero.ne (3 : α)

name: four_ne_zero
initialProofState:
α : Type u_2
inst✝² : Zero α
inst✝¹ : OfNat α 4
inst✝ : NeZero 4
⊢ Ne 4 0
decl:
@[field_simps]
lemma four_ne_zero [OfNat α 4] [NeZero (4 : α)] : (4 : α) ≠ 0 := NeZero.ne (4 : α)

name: zero_ne_one'
initialProofState:
α : Type u_2
inst✝² : Zero α
inst✝¹ : One α
inst✝ : NeZero 1
⊢ Ne 0 1
decl: lemma zero_ne_one' [One α] [NeZero (1 : α)] : (0 : α) ≠ 1 := zero_ne_one

name: one_ne_zero'
initialProofState:
α : Type u_2
inst✝² : Zero α
inst✝¹ : One α
inst✝ : NeZero 1
⊢ Ne 1 0
decl: lemma one_ne_zero' [One α] [NeZero (1 : α)] : (1 : α) ≠ 0 := one_ne_zero

name: two_ne_zero'
initialProofState:
α : Type u_2
inst✝² : Zero α
inst✝¹ : OfNat α 2
inst✝ : NeZero 2
⊢ Ne 2 0
decl: lemma two_ne_zero' [OfNat α 2] [NeZero (2 : α)] : (2 : α) ≠ 0 := two_ne_zero

initialProofState:

inst✝² : Zero α
inst✝¹ : OfNat α 3
inst✝ : NeZero 3

decl: lemma three_ne_zero' [OfNat α 3] [NeZero (3 : α)] : (3 : α) ≠ 0 := three_ne_zero

initialProofState:
α : Type u_2

inst✝¹ : OfNat α 4

decl: lemma four_ne_zero' [OfNat α 4] [NeZero (4 : α)] : (4 : α) ≠ 0 := four_ne_zero

name: NeZero.of_pos
initialProofState:
M : Type u_2
x : M
inst✝¹ : Preorder M
inst✝ : Zero M
h : LT.lt 0 x
⊢ NeZero x
decl: theorem of_pos [Preorder M] [Zero M] (h : 0 < x) : NeZero x := ⟨ne_of_gt h⟩
